qa_list.question: What are the names of the courses being offered in the text?
qa_list.answer: The names of the courses being offered are Dramaturgy B, Production Management C, Stage Management D, Scenic Design E, Carnegie Scenic F, Costume Design G, Lighting Design I, and Lighting Production J.

qa_list.question: What is the schedule for each course?
qa_list.answer: The schedule for each course is as follows: Dramaturgy B - MTWRF 06:30PM-10:30PM, Production Management C - MTWRF 06:30PM-10:30PM, Stage Management D - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Scenic Design E - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Carnegie Scenic F - Boevers, Hines - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Costume Design G - Eshelman - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Lighting Design I - Thomson - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Lighting Production J - Brown - TR 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM.

qa_list.question: Who are the instructors for each course?
qa_list.answer: The instructors for each course are as follows: Dramaturgy B - Young, Production Management C - Holcomb, Stage Management D - Wei, Scenic Design E - Warren, Carnegie Scenic F - Boevers, Hines, Costume Design G - Eshelman, Lighting Design I - Thomson, and Lighting Production J - Brown.

qa_list.question: What is the location of each course?
qa_list.answer: The location for each course is as follows: Dramaturgy B, Production Management C, Stage Management D, Scenic Design E, Carnegie Scenic F, Costume Design G, Lighting Design I, and Lighting Production J are all located in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

qa_list.question: What is the time of each course?
qa_list.answer: The times for each course are as follows: Dramaturgy B - MTWRF 06:30PM-10:30PM, Production Management C - MTWRF 06:30PM-10:30PM, Stage Management D - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Scenic Design E - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Carnegie Scenic F - Boevers, Hines - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Costume Design G - Eshelman - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Lighting Design I - Thomson - W 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM, Lighting Production J - Brown - TR 05:00PM-06:20PM and S 11:00AM-03:00PM.

qa_list.question: What is the day of each course?
qa_list.answer: The days for each course are as follows: Dramaturgy B - MTWRF, Production Management C - MTWRF, Stage Management D - W, Scenic Design E - W, Carnegie Scenic F - Boevers, Hines - W, Costume Design G - Eshelman - W, Lighting Design I - Thomson - W, and Lighting Production J - Brown - TR.
